name: RGBurn
description:
Keep you colour in balance and get the record !

The goal is to achieve the highest score, by picking up correct colour circles, that give you score and also restore your colour that is gradually being burned.
If you lose one of the three colours, burning process will be increased, so you should keep all tree colours in balance.

Game Features:

  • Train your colour skills
  • Play with gamepad, keyboard, mouse or touch
  • Easy to play, hard to master
  • Chill soundtrack
  • Highscore

Have fun!
